net.kuujo.vertigo.component

Interface VerticleConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentConfig<VerticleConfig>, Config<VerticleConfig>, net.kuujo.vertigo.util.serialization.JsonSerializable

    public interface VerticleConfig
extends ComponentConfig<VerticleConfig>
    Verticle component configuration.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.kuujo.vertigo.component.ComponentConfig

        ComponentConfig.Type

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String VERTICLE_IS_MULTI_THREADED
      multi-threaded is a boolean indicating whether a worker verticle is multi-threaded.
      static String VERTICLE_IS_WORKER
      worker is a boolean indicating whether this verticle should be deployed as a worker verticle.
      static String VERTICLE_MAIN
      main is a string indicating the verticle main.

    • Field Detail

      • VERTICLE_MAIN

        static final String VERTICLE_MAIN
        main is a string indicating the verticle main. This field is required for all verticle components.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERTICLE_IS_WORKER

        static final String VERTICLE_IS_WORKER
        worker is a boolean indicating whether this verticle should be deployed as a worker verticle. Defaults to false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERTICLE_IS_MULTI_THREADED

        static final String VERTICLE_IS_MULTI_THREADED
        multi-threaded is a boolean indicating whether a worker verticle is multi-threaded. This option only applies to verticles where worker is true. Defaults to false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setMain

        VerticleConfig setMain(String main)
        Sets the verticle main.
        Parameters:
        main - The verticle main.
        Returns:
        The verticle configuration.

      • getMain

        String getMain()
        Gets the verticle main.
        Returns:
        The verticle main.

      • setWorker

        VerticleConfig setWorker(boolean isWorker)
        Sets the verticle worker option.
        Parameters:
        isWorker - Indicates whether the verticle should be deployed as a worker.
        Returns:
        The verticle configuration.

      • isWorker

        boolean isWorker()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the verticle is a worker.
        Returns:
        Indicates whether the verticle is a worker.

      • setMultiThreaded

        VerticleConfig setMultiThreaded(boolean isMultiThreaded)
        Sets the verticle multi-threaded option. This option only applies to worker verticles.
        Parameters:
        isMultiThreaded - Indicates whether the worker verticle is multi-threaded.
        Returns:
        The verticle configuration.

      • isMultiThreaded

        boolean isMultiThreaded()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the verticle is a worker and is multi-threaded.
        Returns:
        Indicates whether the verticle is a worker and is multi-threaded. If the verticle is not a worker verticle then false will be returned.
